channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Francesca Albanese Documents the Worst Crime Humanity Can Inflict. She’s an Optimist.
item.description: Francesca Albanese’s provocative allegations have made her a villain to some and a hero to others.

item.title: The two wildcards shaping the tail end of the Virginia race for governor

item.title: 'Death fold' proteins can make cells self-destruct. Scientists want to control them
item.description: Scientists are hoping to treat diseases including cancer and Alzheimer's by influencing how cells make life-or-death decisions.

item.title: Amy Coney Barrett Is Looking Beyond the Trump Era
item.description: The Supreme Court justice isn’t making decisions based on public opinion.

item.title: Denmark’s Renewable Energy Prospects Dim Under the Trump Administration

item.title: 80-year-old grandmother becomes oldest woman to finish the Ironman World Championship

item.title: Who Were the Assad Regime's Top Enforcers in Syria?
item.description: An ongoing reporting project to uncover the roles and whereabouts of the key officials who powered President Bashar al-Assad’s brutal reign in Syria.

item.title: How Assad’s Top Henchmen Fled Syria and Justice
item.description: As Syria’s regime collapsed, the world’s eyes were on Bashar al-Assad’s getaway flight. Behind him, officials key to his brutal rule made a mass exodu...

item.title: Israel Marks Two Years Since Oct. 7 as a Fragile Cease-Fire in Gaza Holds
item.description: Ceremonies took place on Thursday to commemorate two years since the surprise attack on southern Israel, according to the Jewish calendar.
